original_text: Mine age is departed, and is removed from me as a shepherd's tent: I have cut off like a weaver my life: he will cut me off with pining sickness: from day even to night wilt thou make an end of me.
korean_text: 나의 거처는 목자의 장막을 걷음 같이 나를 떠나 옮겨졌고 직공이 베를 걷어 말음 같이 내가 내 생명을 말았도다 주께서 나를 틀에서 끊으시리니 조석간에 나를 끝내시리라

sentences.original_text: and is removed from me as a shepherd's tent
I have cut off like a weaver my life
he will cut me off with pining sickness
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 앓는 병으로 나를 끊을 것이며

sentences.original_text: wilt thou make an end of me
